patthana3.12:1.1: Nokilesaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:2.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:4.1: Kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:5.1: Nokilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:6.1: Kilesaṃ akusalañca nokilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:7.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:8.1: Kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchaṃ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccaṃ paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
patthana3.12:9.1: Nokilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
patthana3.12:10.1: Kilesaṃ akusalañca nokilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vicikicchañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca uddhaccañca paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:11.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ, sahajātavārādi vitthāretabbo.)
patthana3.12:12.1: Kileso akusalo dhammo kilesassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:13.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (majjhe tīṇi sahajātādhipati), anantare nava, samanantare nava …pe… upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:14.1: Nokilesaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:15.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:17.1: Saṅkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana3.12:18.1: Asaṅkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:19.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.12:20.1: Saṅkilesikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:21.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:23.1: Saṅkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana3.12:24.1: Asaṅkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:25.1: Saṅkilesikaṃ abyākatañca asaṅkilesikaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:26.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.12:27.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:28.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:30.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:31.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:33.1: Asaṅkiliṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṅkiliṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:34.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:36.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:37.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:39.1: Kilesasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:40.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:42.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:43.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:45.1: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:46.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:48.1: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:49.1: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:50.1: Kilesañceva saṅkilesikaṃ akusalañca saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:51.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ, kilesadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.12:52.1: Saṅkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkilesiko ceva no ca kileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:53.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:55.1: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:56.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:57.1: Kilesañceva saṅkiliṭṭhaṃ akusalañca saṅkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṅkiliṭṭho ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:58.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Kilesadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.12:59.1: Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:60.1: Kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:61.1: Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttaṃ akusalañca kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:62.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Kilesadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.12:63.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana3.12:64.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:65.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.12:66.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
patthana3.12:67.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto asaṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:68.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṅkilesikaṃ abyākatañca kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṅkilesikaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṅkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ.)
patthana3.12:69.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi …pe… pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
